fund.objective: The Fund seeks high total return through a combination of capital appreciation and current income.
fund.strategy: The Quincy G&I Fund places a heavier emphasis on growth while making current income a secondary objective. It targets stocks that fund management believes are cheaply priced relative to their true value. This focus is applied to large companies poised to implement positive change, such as restructuring measures, new products or distribution methods, and cost reductions. This fund has the flexibility to invest in more medium-size companies and holds fewer stocks in more concentrated positions.

competitiveInfo.intro: Unlike comparable funds, the Quincy Growth & Income Fund seeks BOTH growth and income. The Fund also compares very favorably to the funds listed based on recent performance which has been above average.
